column2: what he hadnâ€™t anticipated was that it would stop at every station from Finsbury Park to Stevenage
column3: so by the time the train finally puffed into Cambridge
column4: the station clock showed 2:37 P.M.|Paths of Glory|Jeffrey Archer

column1:
14:37|2:37 P.M.
The conduit was roughly a meter and a half in diameter and pitch dark. He had expected that and had extracted a waterproof flashlight from an emergency kit in the wreckage of the Hind. It was helping
column2: but not all that much. With the heat exchangers off
column3: no water was flowing. The stone walls were merely moist
column4: the curved sides covered with slime.|Project Cyclops|Thomas Hoover
